title: Enjoy the Festive Season at Avari Hotel Apartments Al BarshaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Enjoy the Festive Season at Avari Hotel Apartments Al Barsha Published on : Monday, October 5, 2015
Planning holidays? Unwind and relax, experiencing the real splendor and beauty of Dubai with an atmosphere that’s just perfect for a nice holiday. Indulge in the magic of Dubai hospitality at The Avari Al Barsha Apartments with its special Festive Package 2015. Experience the incredible entertainment, lip –smacking food and a spectacular location, The Avari Al Barsha Apartments promises a memorable holiday at Dubai.
One can avail of this exciting Festive Stay Package by paying AED 798/- for all 3 nights, one can also extent the stay by paying AED 1,500/- for 6 nights .The package is applicable on single/double Avari world traveler apartments. Known for the hospitality, on arrival you can sip on to the welcome drink, and then relax in the comfort of your room and use the free internet service to help plan your holiday in Dubai. The Festive Stay package offers its customers exciting discounts on certain excursions Desert Safari – Dhow Cruise – Wild Wadi – Atlantis Aqua venture.
Dubai has emerged as a leading international tourist destination, offering visitors with wonderful sightseeing and recreational opportunities. Al Barsha is close to Dubai Internet
City, Dubai Marina and the Palm Jumeirah. Landmarks within Al Barsha include Mall of the Emirates, Dubai American Academy, American School of Dubai and Dubai Autodrome.
Conveniently located near shops, malls, beaches and entertainment facilities, Avari Al Barsha Apartments offer a wide variety of premium services like transportation to/from Dubai International Airport at reasonable fee, free WIFI in the lobby and in all apartments. Enjoy a healthy lifestyle with state of the art fitness facilities which include a fully equipped cardio-gym (separate for ladies & gents); separate gents & ladies lockers & changing areas; Jacuzzi; and sauna and not to mention temperature-controlled, rooftop swimming pool. With wide range of healthy choices to indulge in, Avari Hotel Apartments, Al Barsha can surely make your accommodation in the hotel memorable. The rooftop is the perfect place to soak up the sun or enjoy a dip in temperature controlled swimming pool.
So come be a part of this pleasant celebration with “Avari Hotel Apartments Al Barsha”,
Festive Package and gift yourself an experience you well deserve!
